mapper.sql: SELECT dbT5204NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScore.*, dbT5212NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScoreItem.* FROM () AS dbT5204NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScore LEFT JOIN () AS dbT5212NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScoreItem ON dbT5204NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScore."dbT5204NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScore_shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5212NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScoreItem."dbT5212NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScoreItem_shinseishoKanriNo" AND dbT5204NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScore."dbT5204NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScore_ninteichosaRirekiNo" = dbT5212NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScoreItem."dbT5212NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScoreItem_ninteichosaRirekiNo" WHERE dbT5204NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScore."dbT5204NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScore_shinseishoKanriNo" = #{shinseishoKanriNo} AND dbT5204NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScore."dbT5204NinteichosahyoKihonChosaScore_ninteichosaRirekiNo" = #{ninteichosaRirekiNo}
